Class PasswordGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • PasswordGenerator

  • public class PasswordGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates passwords based on a pattern, a seed, and a set of features

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PasswordGenerator()
      Loads the default word list (located inside the .jar archive)
      PasswordGenerator(java.lang.String filename)
      Used when the wordlist is specified by the user

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String generate(java.lang.String seedString, java.lang.String pattern, int characterSwapFrequency, int capitalizationFrequency, int lengthLimit, boolean swappingEnabled, boolean capitalizationEnabled, boolean lengthLimitEnabled)
      Generates a password based on several criteria

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PasswordGenerator

        public PasswordGenerator()
        Loads the default word list (located inside the .jar archive)

      • PasswordGenerator

        public PasswordGenerator(java.lang.String filename)
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Used when the wordlist is specified by the user
        Parameters:
        filename - The path to the wordlist specified by the user
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public java.lang.String generate(java.lang.String seedString,
                        java.lang.String pattern,
                        int characterSwapFrequency,
                        int capitalizationFrequency,
                        int lengthLimit,
                        boolean swappingEnabled,
                        boolean capitalizationEnabled,
                        boolean lengthLimitEnabled)
        Generates a password based on several criteria
        Parameters:
        seedString - The seed used to generate the password
        pattern - The template that the password is generated based on
        characterSwapFrequency - The percentage (out of 100) that a character in the generated password will be swapped for another, random character (if enabled)
        capitalizationFrequency - The percentage (out of 100) that a character in the generated password will have its capitalization flipped (if enabled)
        lengthLimit - The length limit on the password (if enabled)
        swappingEnabled - Determines whether or not the generator will randomly swap characters
        capitalizationEnabled - Determines whether or not the generator will randomly flip capitalization on characters
        lengthLimitEnabled - Determines whether the length limit on the password is enabled
